igmpv3 Struct Reference
[XgIgmp]

#include <igmp.h>

Detailed Description

IGMPv3 query format.


Data Fields

u_char igmp_type
 Version and type of IGMP message.
u_char igmp_code
 Subtype for routing messages.
u_short igmp_cksum
 IP-style checksum.
u_long igmp_group
 Group address being reported.
u_char igmp_misc
 Reserved, supress and robustness var.
u_char igmp_qqi
 Querier's query interval.
u_short igmp_numsrc
 Number of sources.
u_long igmp_sources [1]
 Source addresses.
